New Inflatable Art on Display now at Albuquerque Museum

Posted on Sep 25, 2008 in Exhibition Announcements | No Comments

 Here is an image of the Mayor Rests now on display at the Albuqueruqe Art Museum:

The Mayor Rests will be on display beginning Sat. Sept 27th, 2008.

Here is the show info:

Southwest Biennial
The Albuquerque Museum

Private Opening
Saturday, September 27, 2008
6 – 8 pm
By invitation only; no invite, no admission

Public Opening
Sunday, September 28, 2008
Museum hours are 9 am – 5 pm; (Museum admission is free all day Sunday, September 28)
Juror Panel Discussion 1 – 2 pm
Punch and cookies reception 2 – 4 pm
